name: RPG RPG (College Group Project)
description:
Description

This was a college group project for a game design class. RPG RPG is a top-down shoot 'em up with RPG elements. 

Mechanics 

  •  ASWD / Arrow keys to move 
  •  Mouse to aim and fire
  • By killing enemies, you gain "experience points" (EXP) which you can use to upgrade stats
  • Hit the Esc. to pause the game and click the upgrade button to go to the upgrade menu 
  • To switch weapons, click on the weapon in the inventory menu or use the number keys
  • Collect all "boss keys" hidden in chests across the map to fight the boss and win
